title: WTB: 1888 A&G N28 (Kelly, Anson, Keefe and Clarkson)

posts.post_title: WTB: 1888 A&G N28 (Kelly, Anson, Keefe and Clarkson)
posts.post_content:
Adding the following graded 1888 A&G N28s to my wish list:

1. Kelly
2. Keefe
3. Anson
4. Clarkson

Thanks in advance!
Beth

Hi Beth. FYI - I recent sold a PSA-graded N28 Keefe on eBay and have the other three, all PSA-graded on your list listed right now under seller name "CardinalSportsMuseum" 
[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/376290476207[/url]
